title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 28, 2019
description: On this day in 1886, the Statue of Liberty was officially unveiled: a gift from France celebrating the two countries' shared love of freedom.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1886, the Statue of Liberty was officially unveiled: a gift from France celebrating the two countries' shared love of freedom.
